product_name: Pure Organic Organic Food Bar - 1.7 oz.
long_description: The delicious Pure Organic food bar is made with simple, real ingredients that will satisfy your hunger. Gluten-free bar is vegan, certified organic and certified kosher; does not contain genetically modified organisms, dairy, trans fat or soy. Each Pure Organic food bar contains 5 - 7g of organic protein and 3 - 4g of fiber. Chocolate Brownie flavor combines dark organic chocolate with walnuts. Wild Blueberry flavor mixes organic blueberries with cashews and almonds. Banana Coconut flavor blends creamy organic coconut, bananas and d walnuts. Dark Chocolate Berry flavor combines sweet organic dates, zingy cranberries and juicy raspberries with delicious organic almond, walnuts and delectable organic cocoa. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The delicious Pure Organic food bar is made with simple, real ingredients that will satisfy your hunger.
